title: FCKH8 font??? Help!
content:
You can find more images of the font on Google Images by searching "fckh8". I hope you can help me out.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_mj49aqlWM81qe00iro1\_1280.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326071458/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mj49aqlWM81qe00iro1_1280.png) | 26.87 KB |
| [lskdjalksdjlak.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326071458/http:/typophile.com/files/lskdjalksdjlak.png) | 13.23 KB |
| [Immsakjdhaskjdhasagine.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326071458/http:/typophile.com/files/Immsakjdhaskjdhasagine.png) | 103.86 KB |
author: Orlando92

comments.content:
IMANEO (In My Arrogant Non-Expert Opinion), the CKH block could stand being moved half a red hair to the right.

You mean, you want to know _what_ font is in use? That’s even easier: Click on [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326071458/http:/typophile.com/typeid) and Ask The Experts.

The font in use is Futura in its condensed bold version  
 [http://www.bauertypes.com/tienda/fuentes/futura-nd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326071458/http:/www.bauertypes.com/tienda/fuentes/futura-nd/ "http://www.bauertypes.com/tienda/fuentes/futura-nd/")
